description: Temperatures in Germany's wine-growing regions were not cold enough to produce the dessert wine.
title: Climate change: Warm winter ruins German ice wine harvest
title_page: Climate change: Warm winter ruins German ice wine harvest - BBC News
maintext: "If the warm winters continue in the next few years, ice wines from German wine regions will soon become even more of a rarity than they already are," said Ernst B¨¹scher from the DWI.
